title: Split Grip – Shopify Migration & Redesign
overview: Split Grip is a premium fitness equipment retailer offering over 300 SKUs for home and commercial gyms. Facing growth challenges, the brand needed a more robust e-commerce platform to handle complex product data, enhance customer experience, and scale operations efficiently.
objective: Migrate Split Grip’s extensive product catalog and customer data to Shopify without losing critical information.
Preserve SEO rankings and customer loyalty features.
Improve site performance, mobile responsiveness, and user experience.
Implement advanced e-commerce functionality, including bundles, subscriptions, and integrations with warehouse and shipping systems.
challenges: Managing a high-volume product catalog with complex variations and attributes.
Maintaining custom functionality for equipment bundling and warranty management.
Migrating 15,000+ customer accounts with order history and loyalty points.
Integrating with warehouse management, fulfillment, and subscription systems.
Preserving SEO for high-ranking product pages during migration.
solution: Conducted a thorough store audit and mapped out critical plugins and data relationships.
Developed custom migration scripts to ensure seamless transfer of products, customers, and orders.
Recreated brand identity through custom Shopify theme development and improved mobile UX.
Implemented custom apps for equipment bundles, subscription management, and enhanced fulfillment processes.

implementation.heading: Product Data Migration
points: Transferred 300+ products with all variations, attributes, and images.
Restructured product categories for improved navigation.

implementation.heading: Customer & Order Migration
points: Migrated 15,000+ customer accounts with complete order history.
Maintained loyalty points and wholesale pricing rules.

implementation.heading: Design & UX
points: Developed a custom Shopify theme reflecting the brand identity.
Improved mobile responsiveness, reducing page load times by 2.5x.
Enhanced product filtering and search functionality.

implementation.heading: Extended Functionality
points: Deployed custom apps for bundle creation.
Integrated with ShipStation for smoother order fulfillment.
Implemented subscription-based product management with ReCharge.

results: 32% increase in conversion rate within 3 months.
SEO rankings preserved with zero traffic loss post-migration.
